summary: The diff modifies ICPInfoPage.tsx along with some ancillary files. The truncated ICPInfoPage.tsx content does not explicitly show the three required changes (heading text, text color, blur amount), but the file is confirmed modified. The file-summaries.txt references LandingPage changes but not ICPInfoPage changes specifically. Without seeing the full ICPInfoPage.tsx diff content (it was truncated), it is difficult to confirm all three requirements are implemented. The project_state.json lists all three as 'pending', which may simply be the pre-change state snapshot.

missing_requirements.requirement: Change the heading that currently reads 'teknologiinformasjon' to 'Vår teknologi' in ICPInfoPage.tsx.
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated ICPInfoPage.tsx diff does not show the heading text change. The file-summaries.txt does not mention this change for ICPInfoPage (it mentions 'Vår teknologi' only for LandingPage.tsx). The project_state.json still marks this as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Change all text in the top/hero section of ICPInfoPage to black.
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated ICPInfoPage.tsx diff does not show any text color changes in the hero section. The file-summaries.txt mentions black text only in LandingPage.tsx, not ICPInfoPage.tsx. The project_state.json still marks this as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Increase the CSS blur amount on the background image in the top/hero section of ICPInfoPage.
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated ICPInfoPage.tsx diff does not show any blur CSS changes. The file-summaries.txt does not mention blur changes for ICPInfoPage.tsx. The project_state.json still marks this as 'pending'.
